org.reprap.geometry.polygons
Class RrPolygon

java.lang.Object
  org.reprap.geometry.polygons.RrPolygon

public class RrPolygon
extends java.lang.Object

The main boundary-representation polygon class

public RrPolygon simplify(double d)
Simplify a polygon by deleting points from it that are closer than d to lines joining other points NB - this ignores speeds

Parameters:
d -
Returns:
simplified polygon object

arcCompensate

public RrPolygon arcCompensate()
Offset (some of) the points in the polygon to allow for the fact that extruded circles otherwise don't come out right. See http://reprap.org/bin/view/Main/ArcCompensation. If the extruder for the polygon's arc compensation factor is 0, return the polygon unmodified. This ignores speeds

Parameters:
es -
